description: Glow DJ! Glow Stick! for webOS provides the premiere glow stick experience! Just decide how much techno or rave you want and glow! Includes Techno Sound FX when you shake! Works especially well if you have more than one webOS device!  Need more than just a glowstick? Check out BPM Counter Pro by Chinchilla Tech!  Please note sound fx volume is controlled by system sound settings. For entertainment purposes only, not responsible for damage to phone while shaking. WARNING: Please do not use this app if you suffer from seizures or epilepsy or any other condition that may occur when exposed to flashing lights or certain light patterns. Immediately discontinue use of the app if any discomfort occurs and consult a physician.
